description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(894).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,598,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[894], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(29 + 30 x + 269 x^2 + 299 x^3 + 269 x^4 - 30 x^5 + 29 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 598 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 03 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
